titles.title: Opioid Treatment Surge Act
A bill to establish an annual fee applicable to opioid manufacturers.
Opioid Treatment Surge Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary:
Opioid Treatment Surge Act
This bill establishes a retroactive annual fee for opioid manufacturers, based on the manufacturer's share of the opioid drug market.
